more_features.title: Control What’s Visible in Documents
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} lets you block out or remove parts of your files while keeping them easy to view and share.

feature_1.title: Target and hide text
feature_1.content: Search your document and hide specific words or phrases to protect private info. Use advanced techniques like regular expressions or AI integration to process your data.

feature_2.title: Cover images
feature_2.content: Add overlays to fully or partially hide visuals. Secure image data through your documents on selected pages or particular areas.

feature_3.title: Remove metadata
feature_3.content: Clear hidden document details to avoid unintentional exposure. Find and replace any important metadata using our library.

about.title: What {{ProdFullName}} Offers
about.content: {{ProdFullName}} gives {{ProgLang}} developers an easy way to hide or remove content from {{FileFormatUp}} files. Cover up text, images, and metadata across different document types.
